Class AbstractXsdTreePanel

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
XsdTreePanelImpl, XsdTreePanelImpl
public abstract class AbstractXsdTreePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This Class creates and manages a Panel for displaying and managing the XsdTreeStruct

Author:
Arnaud Ceol, University of Rome "Tor Vergata", Mint group, arnaud@cbm.bio.uniroma2.it

getButtonPanel

public abstract javax.swing.Box getButtonPanel()
create a panel for buttons: her have to be added every buttons such as the ones that allows to load a schema

loadSchema

public void loadSchema()
open a file chooser allowing to choose the file containing the schema, read it, create the tree, and finaly reinitialize everything using a previous tree. Those reinitialisations have to be defined in the emptySelectionLists method
